segments.text: How can she just stand there while the sink overflows like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's gushing out, making a mess of the whole kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's too busy with that stupid plate to notice the flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now the kids are climbing everywhere, what a headache.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is asking for trouble, reaching into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thing's tipping; he's going to break something or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister just waits there, enabling the whole nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like they own the placeâ€”discipline, people!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading, and it's all slippery and gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's turning off that faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene is infuriating with all these hazards ignored.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside mocks the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the water on the cabinets is just ruining everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They better clean this up before I lose it completely.
segments.speaker: PAR
